LoginPage.H4Text: You do not have an account?
LoginPage.Slide1Message: In Puzeos you can chat with other people based on a topic of conversation
LoginPage.Slide2Message: Connect with people who want to talk about the same thing as you

Global.ChangeLanguage: The language will change when you enter the app again.

Error.MinLengthPassword: Password must be at least 9 characters
Error.MinLengthEmail: The email must be at least 6 characters long
Error.MinUserName: Username must be at least 8 characters long
Error.UserNotFound: No user associated with this email

HomePage.WelcomeMessage: Press the + button to chat with another person about a topic.
HomePage.LimitMessage: You can only have 5 chats active at a time, this limit will be removed in future updates

AgregarPage.Title: Add a chat
AgregarPage.SearchPlaceholder: What do you want to chat about?
AgregarPage.RequestTxt: Request that a conversation topic be added, we will notify you if we accept it.
AgregarPage.SearchingMessage: This may take time, we will notify you when we find a partner.
AgregarPage.SelectLanguage: Select the language in which you want to converse, for example, if you want to converse in English, select 'English'.
AgregarPage.SelectTxt: The language you select will be used by default in the next searches, go to 'Settings' to change it.

ChatPage.DeleteChatMessage: You can't send messages because {{value}} deleted the chat
ChatPage.AlertMessage:
We need permission to be able to use the microphone, if you declined, you must activate it.

If you need help, press here and go to the section 'How to activate or deactivate permission'!
